title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting rice grains in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about collecting rice grains in a dream. Some may want to know the interpretation of dreams about collecting rice grains in a dream, which is one of the very disturbing dreams. He makes mistakes and can get hurt, in addition to the fact that the site and its administrators do not have any input into the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about collecting grains of rice in a dream: Seeing someone picking grains of rice in a dream may indicate the large amount of money that the dreamer obtains in the life of that period. Collecting rice in a dream may be a sign of good things that the dreamer will bring in those days. If there is a personal opinion that she collected grains of rice, this may indicate her entry into a new project or good profits that she will receive in those days. It is possible that the vision of collecting A grain of rice in a dream means getting rid of the difficulties that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting dirhams from the ground in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that he is collecting dirhams from the ground can indicate many good things that will come to the dreamer. During this time. The dream of collecting dirhams from the ground in a dream may indicate positive changes that will happen to its owner in those days. Whoever sees in a dream that he is collecting dirhams may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer during that period. Seeing collecting dirhams in a dream may indicate upcoming joys. For the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting golden pounds in a dream: Collecting golden pounds in a dream may indicate the marriage of an unmarried young man or an unmarried girl. A dream about collecting golden pounds may indicate the enormous level of livelihood that the dreamer will acquire during this time. In the event that One saw that he was collecting golden pounds in a dream, this may indicate peace of mind and relief from the stress and tension that the dreamer is suffering from in those days. In the event that you see yourself collecting golden pounds in a dream, this may indicate achieving goals and ambitions during these days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting hail in a dream: Picking up hail in a dream may mean that the dreamer will face some obstacles in his life these days. Picking up hail in a dream may indicate psychological disorders that the dreamer may suffer from at that time. Whoever sees that he is collecting hail, it may indicate the achievement of goals and ambitions. In those days, and God knows best. If you see yourself picking up hailstones in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will face some worries in his life during those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting beads in a dream. Collecting rosaries in a dream could indicate the wealth and luxury that he was living in. In which the dreamer was at that time. If one saw that he was collecting beads in a dream, this may indicate his marriage to a good woman in those days. If one saw collecting rosary beads in a dream, this may indicate the peace and stability that the dreamer was enjoying in His life at that time. It is possible that seeing the collection of prayer beads in a dream may indicate happy events coming to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream

title: What is the interpretation of intending to travel in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The intention to travel in a dream: The dream is one of the good visions that indicate good and happy news that the dreamer will hear, regardless of its type, whether he is a man, a woman, an unmarried girl, or others. We will learn about all of their interpretations in detail below. The intention to travel in a dream. The intention to travel in a dream indicates continuous research and work. The effort that the dreamer exerts to achieve his goals. Seeing the intention to travel in a dream symbolizes the presence of many ambitions that the dreamer dreams of achieving, but there are some responsibilities that prevent him. Also, the intention to travel in a dream is evidence of the improvement of the fortuneteller’s circumstances in the future, God willing. Seeing the intention to travel in The dream is a sign of overcoming the sorrows and problems that bother the lifter, changing his circumstances, and relieving distress and anxiety soon, God willing. In the event that there is an intention to travel in the dream and the inability to achieve it, this is a sign of the harmful morals of the dreamer and bad friends who lead him to disobedience and transgressions. Intention to travel In a dream by Ibn Sirin, the great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the intention to travel in a dream as a change in the dreamer’s circumstances for the better, God willing, in the coming period. Also, the dream of a person who intends to travel and cannot decide on the decision is a sign of distraction, hesitation, and the failure to make fateful decisions in his life. The intention to travel in a dream for a sick person is an indication of the imminent date of his death. Seeing the intention to travel in a dream may indicate an imminent marriage, either for a young man or a girl. In general, seeing the intention to travel in a person’s dream is evidence of goodness, loss of worry, and relief from anxiety, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl intending to travel in a dream means that she is making correct and crucial decisions in her life and that she is able to face crises on her own. Seeing the intention of traveling in a dream indicates finding a suitable job or promotion in the workplace in appreciation of the efforts made by the person. Whoever dreams of traveling, this is a sign For his stability in his life and his freedom from troubles and sorrows, praise be to God. The intention to travel in a dream for a single woman. The intention to travel in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes that someone wants to get close to her and marry her. Seeing a girl intending to travel in a dream means that she wants to travel in reality. Seeing a girl It has nothing to do with the intention of the traveler in the dream. It means that she is social, knows a lot of people, and has a good relationship with everyone around her. Seeing a girl intending to travel in a dream indicates that she loves adventure and novelty. Dreaming of the intention of traveling in a dream for a single woman reflects her courageous personality, which always makes decisions. Right and deals with her problems alone. A girl’s dream that is not related to the intention of traveling is a sign that her life will soon improve for the better. When a single girl dreams of the intention of traveling, this is a sign that she will start her own business. A girl’s dream of traveling is interpreted as a sign that she possesses good qualities. Such as intelligence, humor, and ambition. If a girl dreams of traveling through time, this is a sign that she is currently going through problems and crises in her life and wants to get rid of them in any way possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Qalam in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation scholars have developed an interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Kalam in a dream. A group of scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi interpreted the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Qalam in a dream. Here, Ibn Sirin placed the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Qalam in a dream, and Ibn Sirin also placed the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Anfal and Al-Tawbah in a dream. This is also what Ibn Sirin explained in the interpretation of seeing Surat Yusuf and An-Nahl in a dream. Ibn Sirin also explained in the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Muddaththir and An-Naza'ir in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of Surat Al-Qalam by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Kalam or reading it to him in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will see the wonders of God Almighty. Also, seeing the dreamer reading Surat Al-Kalam or reading it to him in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will attain God's eloquence. When the dreamer sees himself reciting ... come to him with intelligence and wisdom. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Kalam, or reading it to him in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will receive knowledge from God. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Kalam in a dream or reading it to him, this may indicate that the dreamer will be helped by God Almighty against his enemy. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Kalam in a dream or reading it to him, this may indicate that the dreamer will be a person of good morals. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Anfal and Repentance in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Anfal in a dream, this means that the dreamer will triumph over his enemies. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Anfal in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will be granted a lot of spoils. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will live a praiseworthy life among the people of this world. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat At-Tawbah in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will die after a long life after repentance. Interpretation of seeing Surat Yusuf and An-Nahl in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Yusuf in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will remain oppressed at first and then God will help him in the end. Also, seeing the dreamer reciting Surat Yusuf in a dream, this showed that the dreamer will protect the journey he will reside in. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat An-Nahl in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will be healed by God if he is sick. And whoever sees the dreamer reciting Surat An-Nahl in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will gain great knowledge from God. Interpretation of seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Mu'minun in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Mu'minun in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be blessed with the righteousness of his religion and the strength of his faith. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Mu'minun in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will complete his actions with a good deed. When the dreamer sees himself

title: Interpretation of seeing a volcano in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a volcano in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing a volcano in a dream has many meanings. Seeing a volcano can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a volcano in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Volcano in a dream See the volcano in a dream based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a volcano in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing a volcano in a dream indicates the viewer’s awareness of his strong feelings and impulsive feelings. Seeing a volcano in a dream indicates change. Which will happen in the life of the dreamer, and its impact can be negative or positive. Seeing a volcano in a dream announces success from God in the affairs of his life. Seeing a volcano in a dream indicates the presence of some family and emotional crises in the life of the dreamer. Seeing the dreamer after the ruins left by the volcano in the dream indicates... Many crises are approaching in the dreamer's life, but he is trying to overcome them with diligence and diligence. Seeing a volcano in a dream may indicate that the dreamer suffers from confusion and suspicion but resists these things in order to avoid them in his life. Seeing others suffering from a volcano in a dream may indicate some problems and issues that will arise in the life of the dreamer. Those close to the dreamer. See also: Written wind prayer. What is the interpretation of seeing a volcano in a single woman’s dream: Seeing one volcano in a dream indicates her inappropriate behavior that causes her embarrassment and her inability to bear responsibility. Seeing one volcano in a dream may indicate the possibility of some happy things in the dream. Her life, such as the approaching date of her wedding. See also: The lightning and thunder prayer is written. What is the interpretation of seeing a volcano in a dream for a married woman: A married woman seeing a volcano in a dream indicates her bad and inappropriate behavior that will create many problems that will happen to her in the future. A married woman may see a volcano in her sleep. It indicates a big change that will occur in her life and the possibility of having children in the near future, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman sleeping in a volcano in a dream indicates the end of love between her and her husband. What is the interpretation of seeing a volcano in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant volcano in a dream may indicate that she will give birth Male, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant volcano in a dream. It may seem that she had a rough birth, but she will be fine after the operation, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman having a volcano explode in a dream, this may indicate her imminent birth process. See also: Interpretation of seeing an owl in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a volcano? At home? The dreamer seeing a volcano in his house in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur in his life. Seeing a volcano in the middle of the house in a dream states that the fortuneteller will obtain an abundant livelihood and halal money. What is the interpretation of seeing a volcano erupting nearby: Seeing a powerful volcano near the dreamer in The dream shows that he was always feeling suspicious, anxious, and confused in all aspects of his life. See H

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out of the hand

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out of the hand. Today we will talk about it. Interpretation of the dream about a tooth falling out of the hand. As is very common among many people, the dream about a tooth falling out of the hand is one of the dreams that causes fear, and therefore we will present the opinions of the most prominent interpreters of visions and dreams. Interpretation of the dream about a tooth falling out of the hand by Ibn Siriniri Ibn Sirin says that teeth have many meanings and that teeth have many meanings that refer to family and relatives, the upper teeth for men and the lower teeth for women. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing teeth falling out symbolizes the elders of the dreamer’s family. Seeing a tooth falling out in the hand indicates an increase in the lifespan of the dreamer. Seeing a tooth falling out symbolizes the elders of the dreamer’s family. Falling into the dreamer's hands indicates many good things that will come soon. Seeing all the molars falling out indicates that the people of the dreamer's household will die before him. A molar falling out in a dream indicates family problems. The extraction of a molar indicates the death of a loved and dear person. It expresses the dreamer's liberation Of his distress and comfort. A molar falling from the upper jaw to the hand indicates that the dreamer will get a lot of money. A molar falling from the lower jaw to the hand expresses sadness. A molar falling to the ground indicates the death of God. Seeing all the teeth falling out means that the dreamer will suffer A misfortune. A tooth falling out indicates that the debtor pays the debt. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great translators. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out in the hand of Imam Nabulsi. If the dreamer sees his front teeth falling out with a flow of blood or pain, this means that the dreamer will spoil something he wants. And if it falls without pain, it means that he has lost something that belongs to him. Al-Nabulsi believes that a tooth falling out of the hand indicates the longevity of the dreamer. Seeing molars falling out of the hand indicates poverty and loss. Seeing the molars of the lower jaw falling out means that the dreamer will be hurt by sadness and grief. But he will overcome this adversity. Whoever dreams of his molars falling out while picking them indicates the death of one of his children. And whoever sees all his teeth falling out in his hand, this indicates the cessation of childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about molars falling out of the upper and lower jaw in a dream. Opinions of vision and dream interpreters about molars falling out of the upper jaw And the lower: Seeing all the teeth or molars of the upper jaw falling out indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s financial situation. Seeing the loss of a molar from the lower jaw means that the dreamer will pay all his debts. Seeing a molar in the lower jaw falling out and the dreamer carrying the molar indicates the death of one of his friends or the death of a family member. Seeing two years of jaw falling out means that the dreamer will obtain a benefit from one of his relatives. Seeing molars falling out of the upper jaw indicates problems that will affect the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out in a hand in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out in the hand. The most important interpretations given to interpret the loss of a tooth in the hand. For singles, through the site Different: An unmarried woman who sees her molars or teeth falling out indicates a feeling of extreme frustration as a result of overthinking some things. Seeing molars falling out in the hand of an unmarried girl means that she will soon marry a good man. Molars falling to the ground in

Seeing molars falling out of the upper jaw indicates problems that will affect the fortune teller. title: Interpretation of seeing jasmine flowers in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing jasmine roses in a dream is one of the visions that herald good news. Roses in general are happiness, joy and displacement, if they are in good condition and have not withered, and their colors have changed in interpretation: Let us touch on the rest of the dream details by citing the interpretations of vision scholars in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing jasmine roses in a dream Interpretation of seeing jasmine roses in a dream The white jasmine rose, which emits a pleasant scent like musk, is used by lovers and friends in reality to express their feelings, in dreams it is something else, but it is always related to reality. Let us present to you the meaning of jasmine roses in a dream through the following points: White jasmine roses for weddings but also for men. Jasmine expresses love, if you dreamed that you were taking jasmine roses from an enemy in reality, this interprets the end of strife and the beginning of kindness and reconciliation between him and his enemy. Picking jasmine roses in a dream in general, doing something rashly without thinking. If you see in your dream that jasmine roses have turned black, this is something you are looking for, but unfortunately it will not be completed with envy. See also: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of white jasmine for a married womanTo see white jasmine in the house for a married woman, it interprets the money that will come to you soon. While the interpretation of a dream of white jasmine for a married woman, the pregnancy will not be completed, but if the jasmine is good and does not die, the pregnancy will be with temporary financial distress. A married woman saw herself planting peppers in a dream, then this pepper turned green, and this vision indicates that your prayers will be answered, God willing. The interpretation of jasmine in the bedroom of a married woman in a dream came, on a trip or change of residence and installation In it. See also: Backgrounds in a dreamPepper in a dreamJasmine in a dream is money in general and good if it is open and full of growth. As for seeing jasmine in a dream withering, this means problems and worries. If an unmarried girl dreams of receiving a gift from a stranger and it is in good condition, she will marry a righteous man, but if the nut withers, she will marry an inappropriate person. Pepper in the kitchen increases livelihood. While the interpretation of jasmine entered the bedroom, my husband settled down without problems and got rid of envy. See also: Carrying a friend's hand in a dreamInterpretation of seeing jasmine in a dream for a single womanAn unmarried girl dreamed that she planted jasmine flowers in her bedroom and they grew, and this dream means success in her career. Interpretation of seeing jasmine roses in the kitchen for a single girl moving and changing the house. Interpretation of cooking pepper as wrong decisions. While black jasmine indicates envy, and it is said in another interpretation of magic. Multi-colored jasmine roses, that is, in many colors, positive changes in your life. See also: Seeing pins in a dreamSeeing roses and jasmine in a dreamRoses and jasmine in dreams are better if planted Little or much. While it foretells evil if it is cut or withered. title: Find out the interpretation of my dream that my hair was long

preview.html: I dreamed that my hair was long. There is no doubt that seeing long hair seems confusing to many of us, and some do not understand its meaning. There are many indications about it between approval and hatred, and this is determined according to the details and state of opinion and attitudes that differ from one person to another, and in this article we take a look at the true interpretations and specific effects of the dream. For hair. In the long term, where we explain the details that affect the framework of the vision. I dreamed that my hair was long. Long hair expresses adornment, honor, righteousness, longevity, success in all work, good judgment, skill, adherence to covenants, abandoning speech and temptation, and paying attention to what is useful. And whoever sees his hair long, this is a blessing in life. For his health and an increase in his worldly life, and if the hair is long, unlike usual, then these are debts, judgments, conflicts with others, and overwhelming worries. Difficulties are related to life. Long hair symbolizes long offspring, many children, worries and unhappiness in the house, even if it is dirty, these are the sins, disobedience and temptation that a person falls into, cares about and is condemned by. Braiding hair indicates care, setting priorities, collecting wishes, Long, curly hair symbolizes strength and power, and falling hair is not good and evil, illness or a serious crisis. I dreamed that my hair was long by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that long hair deserves praise for women and is disliked by men in some cases, including when a man sees his hair long and is not used to it. On him or appears in a way that does not suit him. Long hair indicates longevity, breadth of diet, luxury of life, enjoyment of health and vitality. Long white hair is disliked and symbolizes anxiety, pain and sadness, and for the poor it is one of the causes of poverty, distress and unstable circumstances, but it also symbolizes dignity, prestige and wisdom. , especially a white beard. If a person intends to grow his hair long and sees it long in a dream, then he can satisfy his need, pay off his debt, and fulfill his vows. I dreamed that I had long hair for single people. Long hair for an unmarried woman is evidence of comfort, happiness, a blessed life, goodness and nourishment for her home, improving her circumstances for the better, and enjoying health and vitality. Long hair also indicates marriage, especially if she sees a young man with long, clean hair, and she can benefit from him or improve by knowing him. Long black hair symbolizes position, status, and promotion. The long hairstyle expresses kindness, nourishment, and tireless striving. As for the hairstyle, it symbolizes... Overcoming difficulties and obstacles, and long hair is disliked if it is under the armpit or on the face. I dreamed that I had long hair for a married woman. Long hair symbolizes status, abundance, blessings, the spread of goodness and benefits, great benefit or spoils, and the appearance of joys and happy occasions. And if the hair is long And blond, this is a trust she protects, a covenant she fulfills, and responsibilities she does not neglect, and long black hair shows her love for her husband, good religion, and integrity. Cutting hair does not deserve praise, and it denotes

title: Interpretation of a dream about a car accident: I saw an accident in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of an accident in a dream for a single, married, pregnant or divorced girl if she survives a simple car accident according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of an accident in a dream is among the dreams that afflict the dreamer with fear and anxiety, because of the signs it carries that express the emergence of problems in the future, and therefore the dreamer can interpret the dream of an accident Who saw it as a warning to avoid any problems arising or receiving wrong decisions that would plunge the person into problems or crises. Although a dream about an accident causes anxiety and fear about the future, it is considered a sign of a painful event or problem that may or may not happen. Therefore, the person who sees the accident does not need to take this meaning seriously and negatively affect his life, as it will only affect us with what was written. God is ours and everything is from God Almighty, but precautions must be taken as we mentioned to avoid any wrong decisions and focus seriously on taking purposeful steps in our lives. A dream incident can represent major problems, hearing bad news, fights, arguments, hostility, or Health or financial problems, or the death or illness of someone, within the family or circle of friends. The meaning of a car in a dream denotes your journey in this world and an accident in a dream is obstacles, fears and problems guiding you in life. If you dream of an accident, this is a warning to avoid any means of travel for a short time , where you are in danger of losing your life. A goal, then you will see a friend losing something of equal value in helping you in your case. Interpretation of a car accident in a single woman’s dream. A car accident in the dream of an unmarried girl and an unmarried woman indicates an intense conflict with her fiancé or lover that may lead to separation. And seeing an unmarried woman in her dream as if the car overturned and she Injured or suffering from fractures, it turns out that she is a girl in a hurry and that she is making a mistake in making the right decisions in her life and she must be careful in every step or decision she makes. Seeing death in a car accidentIf someone sees in his dream that a car accident has occurred and as a result of this accident a person dies, he may It is unknown to you or someone you know. This is evidence that this person suffers from severe anxiety. This anxiety can be related to financial matters or fateful decisions. This vision also indicates that the person needs to plan his affairs well so that he does not regret the path he will take. In the end.Interpretation of a simple car accident in a dream: As for seeing a car accident that resulted in injuries or minor injuries, it is merely a warning to the viewer not to make a decision or matter that may harm him, especially if the viewer is a single girl. He has passed through a financial crisis, and the vision indicates that this crisis is simple and will pass because relief is coming and soon, God willing. Seeing someone you know getting into an accident in a dream. But if he sees one of his friends, relatives, or acquaintances getting into an accident in the dream, this means the dreamer’s fear of this person and his fear of being exposed to This person may suffer any harm, God forbid, especially if the person in his dream saw him as a father, son, brother, or husband. The divine should strengthen and strengthen his relationship with this person, and stay away from matters that will harm him

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mother being upset with her daughter in a dream according to senior imams

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mother who is upset with her daughter in a dream: It is the paradise on earth that God Almighty has given us. It is this caring hand that soothes our wounds and restores the spirit to our bodies. Her presence makes the world meaningful and her smile equals the entire universe. He chases away everyone who tries to harm you, and builds a fortress for you after God with his remembrances. A mother is the same as her life and her loss is a loss. Sad and angry in a dream? We will learn this through the different site in the interpretation of a dream about a mother who is upset with her daughter in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a mother who is upset with her daughter in a dream: Seeing a mother sad by you in reality makes you feel a piece in your soul, the world is controlling your face, and you feel that all roads are blocked in front of you. In a dream, it makes you wake up anxious and looking for an explanation for this anger, and this is the following: Interpretation of a dream about a mother who is upset with her daughter in a dream: If the mother dies and she sees her daughter sad in a dream, this means that there is a debt that must be paid on her behalf. The mother’s anger at her daughter shows that her daughter has She made a mistake in her life. If the mother is alive, then her anger indicates sin and something abnormal that her daughter does. Interpretation of a dream about a mother who is upset with her daughter in a dream. If she dies, this indicates that she will transmit the infection to her daughter. If the mother dies, the dream also indicates her need for zakat and supplication. Seeing the mother screaming and crying in A dream while she is alive in reality indicates an illness that will afflict her for a short period. As a dream, if her mother dies, this indicates her daughter’s shortcomings in maintaining family ties. Interpretation of a dream about a mother who is dissatisfied with her daughter in a dream may show that she is an unfair daughter and that her mother is dissatisfied with her. On the other hand, it can be interpreted The dream may be an indication that the daughter misses her mother very much. The mother may come to her daughter sad as a sign to repeat the mistakes she has committed. The mother’s anger in her daughter’s dream may be a sign of the pressures her daughter is exposed to at home. The mother may convey a message to her daughter in this dream about being careful when dealing with people. This indicates the mother’s dissatisfaction with the way her daughter is living her life. If the mother is alive, the dream may reflect the mother’s disappointment with her daughter in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a mother who is dissatisfied with her daughter in a dream. Her separation indicates that her daughter will begin a new phase in her life. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream in general. A mother in a dream indicates the end of worries and the overcoming of difficulties. A mother is a sign of safety and protection in a dream. Seeing a dead mother in a dream while she is alive means unpleasant news. Seeing a happy mother in a dream indicates future goodness for the dreamer. A traveler who sees his mother alive indicates her longing for him. Talking to the mother In a dream, it indicates upcoming goodness and success. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream in different situations: If you see that your dead mother is calling you in a dream, this indicates the weakness and deception of the fortuneteller. A mother hits her daughter in a dream while she is alive, it shows the mother’s fear of her daughter. But if she dies, her daughter’s silence indicates that The girl will get her inheritance from her mother. A girl hugs her father
